context: Tyler Technologies, Inc. is a government software company focused on software for local government, courts, and public safety. Government software leader. Competing with Oracle, SAP Public.

competitors.name: Oracle
competitors.notes: Major competitor offering various public sector solutions including financial management and ERP systems for government agencies.

competitors.name: SAP
competitors.notes: Enterprise software provider with solutions used by government agencies for financial management and operations.

competitors.name: Microsoft
competitors.notes: Competes with Azure Government and various productivity/cloud solutions specifically designed for public sector.

competitors.name: Salesforce
competitors.notes: Provides Government Cloud and CRM solutions tailored for government entities.

competitors.name: Workday
competitors.notes: Offers financial and HR management systems designed for government organizations.

competitors.name: CGI Group
competitors.notes: IT and business consulting services provider focused on government sector.

competitors.name: NEOGOV
competitors.notes: HR software specifically designed for the public sector and government hiring.

competitors.name: Accela
competitors.notes: Government software specializing in permitting, licensing, and code enforcement.

competitors.name: CivicPlus
competitors.notes: Provides civic engagement and municipal website solutions for local governments.
